meanings.sent1: My aunts always bring me presents on my birthday.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my aunts during family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: My aunts tell the funniest jokes at family reunions.
meanings.sent4: The bond between sisters is like the connection between aunts and nieces.
meanings.sent5: The aunts in our family are known for their kindness and generosity.

meanings.sent1: My aunts always make delicious meals when we visit them.
meanings.sent2: My uncle and aunts took us to the amusement park last weekend.
meanings.sent3: My aunts and uncles are planning a surprise party for my parents.
meanings.sent4: The love between my aunt and uncle is as strong as the bond between aunts and nieces.
meanings.sent5: The aunts in our family are known for their delicious homemade pies.
